get_audio_frame()¶

Returns a numpy array of values between -1.0 and 1.0 for the last frame (made of sub-frames) of audio received

Gets the last body frame data if it exists

reduce_start_times()¶

Finds the earliest starting stream (body, depth, colour etc) and reduces all streams to starting points relative to that
